content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please can you provide the following information:
- Who is the provider of the SEND Local Offer website and / or directory?
- When does the contract end?
- What is the contract value?
- What is the name and position of the commissioner?
- Who is the provider of the Family Information Services (FIS) Local Offer website and / or directory?
- When does the contract end?
- What is the contract value?
- What is the name and position of the commissioner?
- Who is the provider of the Adult Social Care (ASC) Local Offer website and / or directory?
- When does the contract end?
- What is the contract value?
- What is the name and position of the commissioner?
Yours faithfully,
Mathew Kipe

Dear Mathew Kipe,
Thank you for your request for information relating to SEND, FIS, ASC
Directory which we received on 08/01/2025.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 05/02/2025. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Please note that from 1^st January 2025, as part of our commitment to
improving services, the council will accept FOI requests via the online
form which can be found here:
[1]Freedom of Information and Environmental Information requests |
Sheffield City Council
Please bookmark this link for future requests.
The online form is linked directly to our systems in the FOI service as
part of our continued improvement to streamline processes.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [2][Sheffield City Council request email]
This Email, and any attachments, may contain non-public information and is
intended solely for the individual(s) to whom it is addressed. It may
contain sensitive or protectively marked material and should be handled
accordingly. If this Email has been misdirected, please notify the author
immediately. If you are not the intended recipient you must not disclose,
distribute, copy, print or rely on any of the information contained in it
or attached, and all copies must be deleted immediately. Whilst we take
reasonable steps to try to identify any software viruses, any attachments
to this Email may nevertheless contain viruses which our anti-virus
software has failed to identify. You should therefore carry out your own
anti-virus checks before opening any documents. Sheffield City Council
will not accept any liability for damage caused by computer viruses
emanating from any attachment or other document supplied with this e-mail
References
Visible links
1.
https://www.sheffield.gov.uk/your-city-c...
2. mailto:[sheffield%20city%20council%20request%20email]

Dear FOI,
Please can you update me on this? By law, the authority should normally have responded promptly and by 5 February 2025
Yours sincerely,
Mathew Kipe

Dear Mathew Kipe,
Thank you for your request for information relating to SEND, FIS, ASC
Directory which we received on 08/01/2025. We apologise for the delay in
providing our response.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
- Who is the provider of the SEND Local Offer website and / or directory?
- When does the contract end?
- What is the contract value?
- What is the name and position of the commissioner?
- Who is the provider of the Family Information Services (FIS) Local Offer
website and / or directory?
- When does the contract end?
- What is the contract value?
- What is the name and position of the commissioner?
- Who is the provider of the Adult Social Care (ASC) Local Offer website
and / or directory?
- When does the contract end?
- What is the contract value?
- What is the name and position of the commissioner?
Please note that the response below relates to all three areas:
- Who is the provider
People Places Lives
- When does the contract end?
The 24-month initial contract period was until 10th July 2024, with any
optional extensions ending on 10th July 2026.
- What is the contract value?
£121,000 over the full 4-year term which consists of 24 months initial
contract period and 2 x 12-month optional extensions. This is made up from
the following: Year 1 consists of £21,000 implementation + £25,000 yearly
cost.
- What is the name and position of the commissioner?
Dawn Bassinder - Chief Social Work Officer
Sheffield City Council advertises all open tendering opportunities. More
details are available here:
https://www.sheffield.gov.uk/business/pr...
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [1]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioner’s Office. Please see
[2]
https://ico.org.uk/make-a-complaint/offi...
for further details.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [3][Sheffield City Council request email]
From: FOI
Sent: 09 January 2025 11:59
